Text:
It would be very helpful if you could seed so i could reproduce it to all the leechers. Once this torrent is up it will not go down for years. (unless HBO and RIIA captures my machinery) It might be the best tv series ever made.

BTW to all leechers buy the DVD box set if it is available in your country, it is that good. Trust me.
This would be an awesome torrent if somebody would get off their ass and seed.
